statements: SELECT * FROM FoodRecallSystem;
SELECT product_name, recall_date FROM FoodRecallSystem ORDER BY recall_date DESC;
SELECT id, product_name, contamination_level FROM FoodRecallSystem WHERE contamination_level > 5;
SELECT * FROM FoodRecallSystem WHERE batch_number = 'B1234';
SELECT id, product_name, batch_number, recall_date FROM FoodRecallSystem ORDER BY recall_date, batch_number DESC;
SELECT * FROM FoodRecallSystem WHERE contamination_level > 5 ORDER BY recall_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, batch_number FROM FoodRecallSystem WHERE contamination_level = 3;
SELECT id, product_name, recall_date FROM FoodRecallSystem ORDER BY product_name, recall_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM FoodRecallSystem WHERE batch_number LIKE '%ABCD%' AND contamination_level < 3;
SELECT product_name, contamination_level FROM FoodRecallSystem WHERE recall_date > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY product_name ASC, contamination_level DESC;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE manufacturer='Apple';
SELECT product_name, manufacturer FROM products WHERE product_id=5;
SELECT product_name, recall_date FROM products JOIN recalls ON products.product_id=recalls.product_id;
SELECT product_name, contamination_level FROM products WHERE recall_status=true;
SELECT product_id, recall_reason FROM recalls WHERE recall_status=false;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE recall_status = TRUE;
SELECT product_name, manufacturer FROM products WHERE recall_status = TRUE ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, manufacturer FROM products WHERE contamination_level = 'High';
SELECT * FROM recalls WHERE recall_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY recall_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, recall_reason FROM products JOIN recalls ON products.product_id = recalls.product_id WHERE recalls.recall_status = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM Product;
SELECT product_id, product_name, manufacturer FROM Product WHERE manufacturer='ABC Inc';
SELECT product_id, product_name, production_date FROM Product WHERE production_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Recall WHERE recall_reason='Safety Concern';
SELECT product_id, recall_id, log_entry FROM RecallLog ORDER BY log_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Product WHERE manufacturer = 'ABC Manufacturing';
SELECT product_name, production_date FROM Product WHERE expiration_date > CURRENT_DATE;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Recall WHERE recall_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT product_name, manufacturer, production_date FROM Product WHERE contaminated = TRUE ORDER BY production_date DESC;

SELECT Product.product_name, Recall.recall_reason, Recall.recall_date, RecallLog.log_entry FROM Product JOIN Recall ON Product.product_id = Recall.product_id JOIN RecallLog ON Recall.recall_id = RecallLog.recall_id WHERE RecallLog.log_date <= NOW();
SELECT * FROM Product WHERE manufacturer = 'Nike';
SELECT product_name, manufacturer, recall_date FROM Product WHERE recall_date IS NOT NULL ORDER BY recall_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, manufacturer FROM Product WHERE product_name LIKE '%shoes%';
SELECT product_name, reason FROM Product WHERE recall_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT COUNT(*), status FROM Recall GROUP BY status HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT * FROM Product;
SELECT product_name, manufacturer, recall_date FROM Product WHERE recall_date IS NOT NULL;
SELECT p.product_name, c.name AS contaminant_name FROM Product p INNER JOIN Recall r ON p.product_id = r.product_id INNER JOIN Contaminant c ON r.contaminant_id = c.contaminant_id;
SELECT DISTINCT manufacturer FROM Product;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS recall_count, r.status FROM Recall r GROUP BY r.status;
SELECT * FROM product WHERE manufacturer = 'ABC Inc.';
SELECT name, expiration_date FROM product WHERE expiration_date < '2023-01-01';
SELECT id, name, expiration_date FROM product WHERE is_contaminated = TRUE;
SELECT manufacturer, COUNT(*) FROM product GROUP BY manufacturer;
SELECT p.name, m.country FROM product p JOIN manufacturer m ON p.manufacturer = m.name;
SELECT * FROM product WHERE is_contaminated = True;
SELECT name, expiration_date FROM product WHERE manufacturer = 'ABC Company';
SELECT manufacturer, count(*) AS total_products FROM product GROUP BY manufacturer;
SELECT p.name AS product_name, m.name AS manufacturer_name FROM product p INNER JOIN manufacturer m ON p.manufacturer = m.name;
SELECT p.name AS product_name, r.reason AS recall_reason FROM product p LEFT JOIN recall r ON p.id = r.product_id;
